item.title: My first article: A not fully crossed design
item.description: First Step: Check the repeatability of the data Second step: Linear mixed models with backward elimination Linear mixed model Distribution of model residuals Model selection with backward elimination Final model Random effect Third and last step: Analyse results In 2015, I published the article: Is oxidative status influenced by dietary carotenoid and physical activity after moult in the great tit (Parus major)? about my first experimentation. In the aim to investigate on the relationship between dietary carotenoids, physical activity and oxidative status, I captured great tits and kept them in aviaries.
